name: fs.Stats
summary: A fs.Stats object provides information about a file.

methods.name: isBlockDevice
methods.summary: Returns true if the fs.Stats object describes a block device.

methods.name: isCharacterDevice
methods.summary: Returns true if the fs.Stats object describes a character device.

methods.name: isDirectory
methods.summary:
Returns true if the fs.Stats object describes a file system directory.

If the fs.Stats object was obtained from fs.lstat(), this method will always return false. This is because fs.lstat() returns information about a symbolic link itself and not the path it resolves to.

methods.name: isFIFO
methods.summary: Returns true if the fs.Stats object describes a first-in-first-out (FIFO) pipe.

methods.name: isFile
methods.summary: Returns true if the fs.Stats object describes a regular file.

methods.name: isSocket
methods.summary: Returns true if the fs.Stats object describes a socket.

methods.name: isSymbolicLink
methods.summary:
Returns true if the fs.Stats object describes a symbolic link.

This method is only valid when using fs.lstat().

properties.name: atime
properties.summary: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was accessed.

properties.name: atimeMs
properties.summary: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was accessed expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.

properties.name: birthtime
properties.summary: The timestamp indicating the creation time of this file.

properties.name: birthtimeMs
properties.summary: The timestamp indicating the creation time of this file expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.

properties.name: blksize
properties.summary:
The file system block size for i/o operations.

Hard-coded to 4096 on Titanium right now.

properties.name: blocks
properties.summary: The number of blocks allocated for this file.

properties.name: ctime
properties.summary: The timestamp indicating the last time the file status was changed.

properties.name: ctimeMs
properties.summary: The timestamp indicating the last time the file status was changed expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.

properties.name: dev
properties.summary:
The numeric identifier of the device containing the file.

Always returns 0 on Titanium.

properties.name: gid
properties.summary:
The numeric group identifier of the group that owns the file (POSIX).

Always returns 0 on Titanium.

properties.name: ino
properties.summary:
The file system specific "Inode" number for the file.

Always returns 0 on Titanium.

properties.name: mode
properties.summary:
A bit-field describing the file type and mode.

Always returns 0 on Titanium.

properties.name: mtime
properties.summary: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was modified.

properties.name: mtimeMs
properties.summary: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was modified expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.

properties.name: nlink
properties.summary:
The number of hard-links that exist for the file.

Always returns 0 on Titanium.

properties.name: rdev
properties.summary:
A numeric device identifier if the file represents a device.

Always returns 0 on Titanium.

properties.name: size
properties.summary: The size of the file in bytes.

properties.name: uid
properties.summary:
The numeric user identifier of the user that owns the file (POSIX).

Always returns 0 on Titanium.
